text: Ivano Ciano (born 3 May 1983 in San Giovanni Rotondo, Foggia, Italy) is an Italian footballer. He plays as a defender. He is currently playing for Italian Lega Pro Seconda Divisione team Catanzaro. ==External links== *Career statistics Category:Italian footballers Category:Vastese Calcio 1902 players Category:U.S. Catanzaro 1929 players Category:Living people Category:1983 births Category:Association football defenders
title: Ivano Ciano
